name: pub interactions
description: a basic and unfinished concept for the a retro game concerning male and female spaces. The blue background illustrates the male dominated space of a pub, whilst the red sprites depict the threatening interactions a female must engage in during her time at work. The cluttered space and animated subjects attempt to show how this space can threaten and isolate females who are forced to engage in derogatory aspects of work such as glass collecting. These jobs specifically ignore the degrading comments made by individuals in these spaces because they ‘come with the territory’.
